original: intros p n H. apply pl_compat_check_correct in H. apply pl_tl_length_ind. - apply pl_tl_length_pl_compat in H as [H0 _]. auto. - intros a la ls m H0 IH H1 IH'. apply pl_tl_length_pl_compat in H as [_ H1]. apply IH in H0. apply IH' in H1. apply pl_tl_length_rec_6 in H0. apply pl_tl_length_rec_6 in H1. rewrite H0, H1. reflexivity.
